EmailTemplate.name: 17.BBAccess.XLE.All.N.G.N.13061.FN POL (NEW).Email 8 - action
EmailTemplate.subject: 20/30/50%? Calculate your savings when your developments switch to Passive Optical LAN
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Passive Optical LAN cuts costs and boosts smart building connectivity Choosing the right smart building connectivity technology can bring a welcome boost to the profitability of your brownfield or greenfield developments. Nokia has made it easy to calculate how much a switch to Passive Optical LAN could save you and your customers.
Input some basic information about your property’s networking requirements – floors, end-points and cabling – into our LAN Savings Calculator and we’ll show you how much cheaper Passive Optical LAN is compared to a traditional Ethernet-over-copper LAN.
What’s more, Passive Optical LAN liberates floorspace, reduces building loads and contributes to a greener, leaner development. U.S. and Canada:+1 866-231-0264 (M-F 8:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. EST)
Europe & Asia Pacific: + 44 203 582 5650 (M-F 8:00a.m.- 4:00p.m. GMT)
Or use the How to Buy form <[[https://networks.nokia.com/how-to-buy]]>
Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
